scripts.start: npm run dir:css; npm run dir:js; npm run dev:jekyll & npm run dev:css & npm run dev:js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css & npm run lint:js
scripts.dev:css: node-sass-watcher src/assets/css/main.scss --output dist/assets/css/main.css -c 'node-sass <input> --source-map-root file://${PWD}/ --source-map-embed true -s | npm run postcss:autoprefixer -s'
scripts.dev:jekyll: bundle exec jekyll serve -H 0.0.0.0 --livereload --config 'src/_config.yml,src/_config-common.yml,src/_config-development.yml' --source src/ --destination dist/ --incremental
scripts.build: npm run clean:css; npm run clean:js; npm run build:jekyll; npm run build:js; npm run build:css; npm run clean:maps
scripts.build:jekyll: JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --config 'src/_config.yml,src/_config-common.yml,src/_config-production.yml' --source src/ --destination dist/
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css; npm run css:scss -s | npm run postcss:autoprefixer -s | npm run postcss:cssnano -s | npm run exorcist -s
scripts.build:js: npm run clean:js; npx babel src/ | npx uglifyjs -o dist/assets/js/app.js
scripts.doctor:jekyll: bundle exec jekyll build --source src/ --destination dist/ --profile
